text: Ngakho-ke ngamunye sambamba ngesono sakhe phakathi kwabo kunalabo esabathumelela ngesichotho futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo abathathwa ngumsindo owesabekayo futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo esabagwinyisa ngomhlabathi futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo esabaminzisa futhi akusiyena uMvelinqangi owenza okungalungile kubona kepha imiphefumulo yabo eyenza okungalungile
